verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--sanātanera hañāche mocana
acirāt āmā-saha ha-ibe milana

synonyms: prabhu kahe-Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; sanātanera-of Sanātana Gosvāmī; hañāche-there has been; mocana-release; acirāt-very soon; āmāsaha-with Me; ha-ibe milana-there will be meeting.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu immediately replied, "Sanātana has already been released from his confinement, and he will very soon meet with Me."
